Content:: Muhudugama Hewage Gunaratna Weerakoon (10 November 1947 – 24 December 2021) was a Sri Lankan teacher and politician. He was a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and a government minister. He died on 24 December 2021, at the age of 74.[1]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
